index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF DESIGN CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Refrigeration Systems Code, Chapter 6.82 of the Seattle Municipal Code; amending Sections 6.82.020, 6.82.030, 6.82.060, 6.82.100, 6.82.110, 6.82.120, 6.82.190, 6.82.320, and repealing Sections 6.82.050 and 6.82.180.
